text_block_list.text: At the end of the year, Sakura Bakushin O invited me to watch the Arima Kinen, the race that would close out the year.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Haa～, I wonder which Uma Musume will win this year? I'm starting to get a little nervous!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Who did you vote for in the fan vote? You know, I voted for――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hoowaaahh…! This is great, there are so many people here!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president, I find it far more rewarding to organize a class with more people than one with fewer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: There are as many troubles as there are people! Because there are as many troubles as there are class presidents!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah!! It's about to start!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah, I'm gonna have to call――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You over there!! Class is right about to start! Cell phones off!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Ah, okay! …Class?
――And thus began the Arima Kinen. An Uma rushes to the front and pushes forward, the pack following her intently…
The sight of the fierce competition between such top-notch Uma Musume was so intense that it makes the viewer's heart beat faster…!
(Woooooahhhh…!!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …… I was just thoroughly convinced.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As I thought… That was a race just for me, wasn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: How does one become class president, you ask!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is she smart? Can she eat quickly? Is she trusted by the teacher? What's her walking speed?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: All of these criteria are correct. However, the most important thing was not there.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed, the most important thing is… Please answer the question, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Absolutely incorrect!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The correct answer was, "popularity"! The class president is the result of everyone's confidence in her!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And the "Arima Kinen" is a fan-voted race. In a way, it is a gathering of endorsed Uma Musume…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I knew it!! It's nothing but a race for me, the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's definitely, 100% run in it next year! The Arima Kinen is waiting for me!
…Distance aptitude makes it nearly impossible for her to run the Arima Kinen.
But if she puts this motivation to good use and trains hard, she can become even stronger than she already is. If that happens…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes!
choice_data_list:
What's the most important thing about running the 
Arima Kinen?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's being the class president!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What a surprise!? Then, what in the world…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufu… I see, I read that. So, in other words, Trainer is…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――You're asking me to further refine my speed to take on the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood! I shall… take those instructions!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu-fu-fu… I can already imagine the crowd going wild at my speed!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Just a little more patience, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Because I'll run this race with the honorable title of class president!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Class president…?
This is how Sakura Bakushin O succeeded in igniting her motivation for speed even further.
